title: Bug 2529 [Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529 [Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: Multiple projects are created in the system.
EB: The option to open or close a project is not consistently available in the navigator.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create two projects in the system, named P1 and P2. 
2. Select P2 and close it.
